00022 /**
00023  * @file   apt-probeset-genotype.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Thu Jan 19 14:18:57 2006
00026  *
00027  * @brief  Initial version of program that uses chipstream architecture to
00028  *         analyze SNP chips.
00029  * @todo What happens to chp files when they are partially written? What should happen?
00030  * @todo More documentation for code, including high level summary. - Some done.
00031  * @todo Output "sampling" reports on summarization on qc reports.
00032  * @todo Read parameters from single file.
00033  * @todo Use robust estimators for cluster centers. - Not going to be implemented.
00034  * @todo Enable outputs easy to plot in R.
00035  * @todo Make gender estimates 'unknown' when no chrX SNPs are supplied.
00036  */
00037 
00038 //
00039 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00040 #include "chipstream/apt-probeset-genotype/ProbesetGenotypeEngine.h"
00041 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00042 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00043 #include "util/Fs.h"
00044 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00045 #include "util/MsgSocketHandler.h"
00046 #include "util/Util.h"
00047 
00048 
00049 /** Everybody's favorite function... */
00050 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) {
00051   ofstream logOut;
00052   LogStream log;
00053   string logName;
00054 //#ifndef WIN32
00055 
00056 //#endif
00057   try {
00058     ProbesetGenotypeEngine engine;
00059     
00060     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00061     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00062     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00063     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00064     
00065     /* Parse options. */
00066     engine.setUsage(
00067                     "apt-probeset-genotype - program for determining genotype calls\n"
00068                     "from Affymetrix SNP microarrays. The model based algorithms for\n"
00069                     "making calls (brlmm/brlmm-p/birdseed) require multiple cel files\n"
00070                     "to be analyzed at once to learn the parameters for each SNP. \n"
00071                     "\n"
00072                     "usage:\n"
00073                     "  BRLMM (500K arrays):\n"
00074                     "    apt-probeset-genotype -c chip.cdf --chrX-snps chip.chrx \\ \n"
00075                     "         -o out-dir/ *.cel\n"
00076                     "\n"
00077                     "  BRLMM-P (GenomeWide SNP 5.0 arrays):\n"
00078                     "    apt-probeset-genotype -c chip.cdf --chrX-snps chip.chrx \\ \n"
00079                     "         -o out-dir/ -a brlmm-p --read-models-brlmmp chip.models \\\n"
00080                     "          *.cel\n"
00081                     "\n"
00082                     "  Birdseed (GenomeWide SNP 6.0 arrays):\n"
00083                     "    apt-probeset-genotype -c chip.cdf --special-snps chip.specialSNPs \\ \n"
00084                     "         -o out-dir/ -a birdseed --read-models-birdseed chip.birdseed.models \\\n"
00085                     "          *.cel\n"
00086                     "\n"
00087                     "  See the apt-probeset-genotype manual for more information about\n"
00088                     "  birdseed including the latest improvements from The Broad.\n"
00089                     );
00090     
00091     
00092     // Setup Options
00093     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00094     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00095     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00096     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00097     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00098     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00099     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00100     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00101     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00102     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00103     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00104     
00105     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00106     engine.checkOptions();
00107     engine.checkDiskSpace();
00108 
00109     // Set up the logging and message handlers.
00110     engine.openStandardLog("apt-probeset-genotype.log",logOut,log);
00111     
00112     // Run the engine. Will exit with non-zero exit statis if fails.
00113     engine.run();
00114   } 
00115   catch(...) {
00116       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00117       // Close log files
00118       logOut.close();
00119       return 1;
00120   }
00121   // Close log files
00122   logOut.close();
00123     
00124   return 0;
00125 }
